Hostelworld.com brings you online bookings at the best selection of hostels in BC. Read customer reviews of British Columbia hostels, view hostels on map of the province of BC and avail of free SMS confirmations.

Mixing breathtaking scenery and bustling cities, British Columbia is a great choice for any kind of adventure, whether you prefer whale watching or partying into the wee hours. Make your way to Vancouver, one of the largest cities in Canada, to enjoy sushi, explore the city’s diverse neighbourhoods and more. For something a bit more active, hit the slopes in Whistler for hiking in the summer and skiing or snowboarding in the winter.
